00020 
00021 BusEditor::BusEditor( QWidget *parent, 
00022                                          LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00023                                          QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef, 
00024                                          QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition> absDef,
00025                                          bool disableBusDef):
00026 TabDocument(parent, DOC_PROTECTION_SUPPORT), 
00027 libHandler_(libHandler),
00028 busDef_(busDef),
00029 absDef_(absDef),
00030 editableBusDef_(),
00031 editableAbsDef_(),
00032 busDefGroup_(this),
00033 absDefGroup_(this) {
00034 
00035         Q_ASSERT_X(busDef, "BusEditor constructor",
00036                 "Null Bus Definition pointer given as parameter");
00037 
00038         // make copies of the bus definition and abstraction definition
00039         editableBusDef_ = QSharedPointer<BusDefinition>(new BusDefinition(*busDef.data()));
00040 
00041         // if abstraction definition is being edited
00042         if (absDef) {
00043                 editableAbsDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition(*absDef.data()));
00044                 absDefGroup_.setAbsDef(editableAbsDef_);
00045         }
00046         // if abstraction definition is not being edited.
00047         else {
00048                 absDefGroup_.setDisabled(true);
00049         }
00050 
00051         busDefGroup_.setBusDef(editableBusDef_);
00052         busDefGroup_.setDisabled(disableBusDef);
00053 
00054         setupLayout();
00055 
00056         connect(&busDefGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00057                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058         connect(&absDefGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00059                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         connect(&absDefGroup_, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00061                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062         connect(&absDefGroup_, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00063                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00064 
00065     VLNV const* vlnv = busDef_->getVlnv();
00066     setDocumentName(vlnv->getName() + " (" + vlnv->getVersion() + ")");
00067     setDocumentType(tr("Bus"));
00068 
00069     // Open in unlocked mode by default only if the version is draft.
00070     setProtection(vlnv->getVersion() != "draft");
00071 }
00072 
00073 BusEditor::~BusEditor() {
00074 }
00075 
00076 bool BusEditor::save() {
00077 
00078         // if abstraction definition is being edited
00079         if (absDefGroup_.isEnabled()) {
00080                 // save the changes from the model to the abstraction definition
00081                 absDefGroup_.save();
00082 
00083                 *absDef_ = *editableAbsDef_;
00084                 libHandler_->writeModelToFile(absDef_);
00085         }
00086 
00087         // if bus definition is being edited
00088         if (busDefGroup_.isEnabled()) {
00089                 // copy the settings from the temporary items to the original
00090                 *busDef_ = *editableBusDef_;
00091 
00092                 libHandler_->writeModelToFile(busDef_);
00093         }
00094 
00095         return TabDocument::save();
00096 }
00097 
00098 bool BusEditor::saveAs() {
00099 
00100     // Ask the user for a new VLNV along with the directory.
00101     VLNV vlnv;
00102     
00103         VLNV busDefVLNV;
00104         QString busDirectory;
00105 
00106         VLNV absDefVLNV;
00107         QString absDirectory;
00108 
00109         // if bus definition is being edited
00110         if (busDefGroup_.isEnabled()) {
00111                 if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, libHandler_, *busDef_->getVlnv(), vlnv, busDirectory)) {
00112                         // If the user canceled, there was no error.
00113                         return true;
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 // copy the settings from the temporary items to the original
00117                 busDef_ = QSharedPointer<BusDefinition>(new BusDefinition(*editableBusDef_.data()));
00118                 editableBusDef_ = QSharedPointer<BusDefinition>(new BusDefinition(*busDef_.data()));
00119 
00120                 busDefVLNV = VLNV(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00121                         vlnv.getName(), vlnv.getVersion());
00122 
00123                 busDef_->setVlnv(busDefVLNV);
00124                 editableBusDef_->setVlnv(busDefVLNV);
00125         }
00126 
00127         // if abstraction definition is being edited but not the bus definition
00128         else if (absDef_ && !busDefGroup_.isEnabled()) {
00129                 if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, libHandler_, *absDef_->getVlnv(), vlnv, absDirectory)) {
00130                         // If the user canceled, there was no error.
00131                         return true;
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 absDefGroup_.save();
00135 
00136                 absDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition(*editableAbsDef_.data()));
00137                 editableAbsDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition(*absDef_.data()));
00138 
00139                 absDefVLNV = VLNV(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00140                         vlnv.getName(), vlnv.getVersion());
00141 
00142                 absDef_->setVlnv(absDefVLNV);
00143                 editableAbsDef_->setVlnv(absDefVLNV);
00144 
00145                 // write only the abs def
00146                 libHandler_->writeModelToFile(absDirectory, absDef_);
00147 
00148                 setDocumentName(absDefVLNV.getName() + " (" + absDefVLNV.getVersion() + ")");
00149                 return TabDocument::saveAs();
00150         }
00151     
00152         // if both are being edited (now the bus definition vlnv has already been defined but not abs def)
00153         if (busDefGroup_.isEnabled() && absDef_) {
00154 
00155                 // remove the possible .busDef from the end of the name field
00156                 QString absDefName = busDefVLNV.getName();
00157                 absDefName = absDefName.remove(".busDef", Qt::CaseInsensitive);
00158 
00159                 absDefGroup_.save();
00160 
00161                 absDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition(*editableAbsDef_.data()));
00162                 editableAbsDef_ = QSharedPointer<AbstractionDefinition>(new AbstractionDefinition(*absDef_.data()));
00163 
00164                 // create automatically vlnv for the abstraction definition
00165                 absDefVLNV = VLNV(VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00166                         absDefName + ".absDef", vlnv.getVersion());
00167 
00168                 // by default both bus def and abs def are saved in same directory
00169                 absDirectory = busDirectory;
00170 
00171                 // if the automatic abs def vlnv is taken
00172                 if (libHandler_->contains(absDefVLNV)) {
00173                         VLNV newAbsDefVLNV;
00174 
00175                         if (!NewObjectDialog::saveAsDialog(this, libHandler_, absDefVLNV, newAbsDefVLNV, absDirectory)) {
00176                                 // if user canceled
00177                                 return true;
00178                         }
00179                         // save the created abstraction definition vlnv
00180                         absDefVLNV = newAbsDefVLNV;
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 // update the vlnvs of the abs def
00184                 absDef_->setVlnv(absDefVLNV);
00185                 editableAbsDef_->setVlnv(absDefVLNV);
00186 
00187                 // update the abs def's reference to bus def
00188                 absDef_->setBusType(busDefVLNV);
00189                 editableAbsDef_->setBusType(busDefVLNV);
00190 
00191                 // write the abs def and bus def
00192                 libHandler_->writeModelToFile(busDirectory, busDef_);
00193                 libHandler_->writeModelToFile(absDirectory, absDef_);
00194 
00195                 setDocumentName(absDefVLNV.getName() + " (" + absDefVLNV.getVersion() + ")");
00196                 return TabDocument::saveAs();
00197         }
00198         
00199         // if only bus def was being edited, write bus def and set the name
00200     libHandler_->writeModelToFile(busDirectory, busDef_);
00201         setDocumentName(busDefVLNV.getName() + " (" + busDefVLNV.getVersion() + ")");
00202         return TabDocument::saveAs();
00203 }
00204 
00205 void BusEditor::setupLayout() {
00206 
00207         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00208         topLayout->addWidget(&busDefGroup_);
00209         topLayout->addWidget(&absDefGroup_, 1);
00210 }
00211 
00212 VLNV BusEditor::getComponentVLNV() const {
00213 
00214         // if abstraction definition is being edited then use it as the identifier.
00215         if (absDef_)
00216                 return *absDef_->getVlnv();
00217 
00218         // if only bus definition is being edited then use it as identifier.
00219         else
00220                 return *busDef_->getVlnv();
00221 }

00223 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00224 // Function: setProtection()
00225 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 void BusEditor::setProtection(bool locked)
00227 {
00228     TabDocument::setProtection(locked);
00229     setEnabled(!locked);
00230 }
